questions.question: In his compilation of the hundred greatest leaders in history, Michael Hart named _________________ as number one.
The Prophet (pbuh) demonstrated servant leadership. This is very obvious in ___________________________.

choices.answer: The way he helped in building the Masjid and digging the trench
How he treated the man who urinated in the Masjid
How he used to smile all the time
How he solved the fight over the black stone

questions.question: The way Prophet (pbuh) managed the business of Khadijah RA and how he maintained the trusts of his people indicate his

choices.answer: leading by example and facing hardship with your followers

questions.question: The Battle of Hunayn provides an example of the Prophet's courage and confidence.
The Prophet (pbuh) was fair only with his companions.
One of the qualities of great leaders is decisiveness. It means ________________________.

choices.answer: considering options and moving to action after one's mind is made

questions.question: The Prophet (pbuh) showed ___________ when he ruled in favor of a non-Muslim against a Muslim based on evidence?
Which of the following examples show the Prophet's courage?

choices.answer: How stood his ground at the battle of Hunayn when the companions fled
He returned the belongings of the Quraysh when he was making Hijrah
The way he decided who will place the black stone back in the Ka'bah
The way he ruled in favour of some non-Muslims based on the evidence

questions.question: The Prophet (pbuh) demonstrated a leadership quality by forgiving the Quraysh upon the conquest of Makkah.
